Name: Sudden Raid
Desc: Calls in a horde of friends to attack enemies. Sudden Raid is not affected by enemies in the Damage Reflection status.

H.Old: MP Cost: 290. Consumes 1 throwing star. Attacks up to 15 enemies at 494% damage 7 times. 1% DoT every 1 sec. for 10 sec. Cooldown: 30 sec.
H.New:
Cost: 290 MP and 1 throwing star. Attacks up to 15 enemies at 494% Damage 7 times.
1% DoT every 1 for 10 sec.
Cooldown: 30 sec.
